data.message: Thank you Facebook, because of you I have found most about 78%of my old school friends and all the members of 2 of my aunts that died,and friends I have met while driving truck,and I have lived many places in the United States and have found almost all of them. So people that I loved and missed and thought were gone forever, thanks to you Facebook I am again keeping up with my family and friends. Good job. Thank you, keep up the good work and caring for your people and I can say for what you have done to help me find so many people that are so important to me, I guess you can say that makes Facebook my best friend. Happy Friendship Day to all of you, and thank you all.God  Bless You Facebook.

replies.message: That's amazing, Marie. Thanks for stopping by and sharing such neat stories of staying connected to your friends throughout the country. -Abby
Facebook it's so true, it's like you all gave me my life back. I love you all to so much, thank you again. Sincerely yours Marie Chappel
Facebook WHat editior (VIDEO) Do you use?

I love facebook. While it's good to meet people from other cultures and walks of life, it also has it's downfalls as well. Is it we are to ONLY communicate with people we know.? It can be a puzzel sometimes...?
Congratulations Facebook.  Great job.  Fostering friendship around the worldwide
